mention.text: `` the mexican , '' a well-known colombian drug trafficker who is one of the drug lords of the medellin cartel
a well-known colombian drug trafficker who is one of the drug lords of the medellin cartel
the first steps that are needed to get colombians to sit at a negotiating table without excluding anyone
